synonyms.synonym: SubName: cAMP-dependent protein kinase catalytic subunit beta isoform 2
SubName: cDNA, FLJ95374, Homo sapiens protein kinase, cAMP-dependent, catalytic, beta(PRKACB), transcript variant 2, mRNA

protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein
